name: Lost Minotaur
languages: Understands the languages it knew in life but can't speak
conditionImmune: charmed, exhaustion, frightened, paralyzed, poisoned, stunned

trait.name: Charge
text: If the lost minotaur moves at least 10 feet straight toward a target and then hits it with a gore attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra 13 (3d8) piercing damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 16 Strength saving throw or be pushed up to 10 feet away and knocked prone.

trait.name: Keen Smell
text: The lost minotaur has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
text: The lost minotaur has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Sense Life
text: The lost minotaur can magically sense the presence of living creatures within 1 mile away. It knows each creature's general direction but not exact location.

action.name: Multiattack
text: The minotaur makes two twilight greataxe attacks.

action.name: Twilight Greataxe
text: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 18 (2d12 + 5) slashing damage and 9 (2d8) necrotic damage.

action.name: Gore
text: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 14 (2d8 + 5) piercing damage.
